refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks if given strings can be confused

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
string1
First string to check.
string2
Second string to check.
errorCode
This variable is set by-reference to &integer; containing an error, if there was any.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns &true; if two given strings can be confused, &false; otherwise.
